document_data.name: Soretyo
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Soretyo''' family was a secret society who based themselves in the city of [[Foo Nakar]] in [[Koryo]] around [[1357 DR]].

[[Ninja]] in service to the family were the primary users of [[green sleeping dust]].
